shadow.name: INDIFFERENCE
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Enthusiasm, expressing through indifference

gift.name: VERSATILITY
gift.description: The gift frequency of Enthusiasm, expressing through versatility

siddhi.name: MASTERY
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Enthusiasm, expressing through mastery

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 16 shadow frequency. The indifference you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural versatility. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from indifference to versatility.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your throat. Notice the sensation of indifference.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 16 consciously for 7 days, the indifference pattern will shift toward versatility.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 16 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from indifference toward versatility
